ValidationRule.description: When User Account Type = True then Customer is Required on the Account Type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( IF(ISCHANGED(Automation_Control__c), IF( CONTAINS(Automation_Control_Type__c, "Validation"),FALSE,TRUE),TRUE), NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( User_Account_Type__c ) ) ), NOT( ISPICKVAL( Account.Type , "Customer") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: On the Account record, Type needs to be changed to "Customer" if you fill in the User Account Type field
